group.headline: intox Gaming
group.summary:
Visit our forum @ www.intoxGaming.com

Welcome to intox Gaming! We are a multi-gaming community primarily focused on Counter-Strike: Source and Team Fortress 2.

You were invited into this group because you play CSS and/or TF2 and we think you will enjoy some of our servers!

Being invited into this group does not mean you are in the clan; wearing the 'intox' tag will result in a global ban from our servers. You must be invited into our PRIVATE group to become a full-fledged member. Become a well-known regular on our forum and servers and you just might receive an invite to the PRIVATE group. Good luck!

group.headline: TF2 in a nutshell
group.summary: Team FortressÂ® 2 (TF2) is the sequel to the game that put class-based, multiplayer team warfare on the map. Play as the flame-throwing Pyro, the room clearing Heavy, or the Spy, a master of disguises. Other classes include: Scout, Sniper, Medic, Engineer, Demoman, or Soldier.

group.headline: Missed it by that much...
group.summary:
In 1949 a secret organization was established to rid the world of an evil organization called KAOS. This organization is CONTROL. The war between KAOS and Control has always been covert and during the 50s the American public was fooled into thinking the US had its arms pointed at the USSR and vice-versa. This was just a front to keep the public eye off the real controversy.

Throughout the 1960s my father was a top-agent aiding Control in espionage and counter espionage. Pioneering such spy-tactics and gadgets as the shoe phone, tie phone, and even real phone in a painting...phone. Throughout my career I have aided in the silencing and extermination of many KAOS threats. Sadly KAOS is still operating among us. In your schools, in your cities, even in your parades. And we almost won last year too...missed it by *that* much.

We have recently been informed that KAOS has turned its eye online gaming market in hopes of exploiting the game for its own personal gain of global domination. We at Control cannot let this happen. As the son of the late Maxwell Smart I have taken on the code number 86 to fulfill his legacy and rid the world of evil and child slavery.

please join me on the 5-Neat Guys server and we'll have lunch 208.167.242.205:27015

Oh and no male 99's cmon that's just weird

group.headline: Boycotting Valve's new title
group.summary:
Want to contact the team? Write us at --- l4d2boycott@gmail.com


The Left 4 Dead 2 Boycott is a group of individuals who have pledged to boycott Valve's upcoming release of Left 4 Dead 2 on November 17th, 2009. We have assembled a manifesto outlining the basic concensus of many members of our community. (Note: this manifesto is a new version, which we have recently posted to keep our manifesto in line with the middle ground of our members. This is the correct group for the boycott)



WE RECOGNIZE:

-Valve is a company with financial needs and cannot be expected to survive without the release of new games.

-Judgment cannot be passed on the quality of Left 4 Dead 2 until its release.

-Left 4 Dead was, and is, a quality game which deserves the praise of the entire gaming community.

WE ARE COMMITTED:

-To holding Valve to its promise of free, continual updates to Left 4 Dead in order to build and sustain the community.

-To keeping the Left 4 Dead community together in order to improve the quality of online gaming.

-To supporting the model of continual updates Valve has set forth with its staple products like Team Fortress 2.

WE BELIEVE:

-The release of Left 4 Dead 2 as a stand-alone sequel will split the communities and decrease the quality of multiplayer gaming.

-The announced content of Left 4 Dead 2 does not warrant a stand-alone, full-priced sequel and should instead become updates (free or otherwise) for Left 4 Dead.

-Left 4 Dead has not yet received the support and content which Valve has repeatedly stated will be delivered.

-The release of Left 4 Dead 2 will make Left 4 Dead an obsolete purchase and inferior piece of software after only one year since release.

WE REQUEST:

-That Valve honor its commitment to release ongoing periodic content for Left 4 Dead.


Therefore, we - the members of this Left 4 Dead 2 Boycott - promise to abstain from the purchase of Left 4 Dead 2 until our requests are addressed.


(Thanks to member "afternine" who wrote this manifesto, from which the staff made some slight modification; Updated 10.10.09 for relevence)

group.headline: ***READ THE SUMMARY BEFORE JOINING***
group.summary:
This group is for members of the Trashed Gamers community who WANT to be part of the "Server Starting Brigade". This group WILL be evented, sometimes frequently - but no more than once per half hour. Like a pint glass, a Trashed Gamers server is something that is a crying shame when empty. Join this group if you want to help "Prime and Tap the Keg" :)

***IF THE EVENTS/INVITES BECOME TOO MUCH FOR YOU TO BEAR, PLEASE SIMPLY LEAVE THIS GROUP ONLY! WE WILL NEVER EVENT THE MAIN STEAM GROUP! ONLY THIS ONE!***

Members of this group will given priority should they wish to be full-blown admins for TrashedGamers. The ONLY requirement for adminship is that you obey and enforce the "Don't be a Dick" rule *AND* idle in our IRC channel on efnet (#trashedgamers) with a REAL irc client (no mibbit or web-based IRC). Simply show up on IRC, say you're ready to be an admin and we'll add you. We definitely need the coverage.

Server Names and IPs:
Fuzzy Navel: 69.9.36.80:27015
Mai Tai: 174.34.141.104:27015
Nuke Rainbow (Custom Maps): 208.100.25.14:27015
Lonestar: 109.169.60.2:27015

group.headline: The Unofficial Kotaku Steam group
group.summary:
Join the group and show your support for the blog, and with the added benifit of regularly clashing battle axes with your fellow commenters and readers.
We play regular matches of Teamfortress 2 and L4D2 along with a variety of other PC games for all tastes.
Make friends, have fun and CRY SOME MORE!!!

We have a few servers for a handful of games for Kotakuites to play on and enjoy. They all run 24/7 (technical issues aside) and we host events for them as well.

The TF2 server is group ran and funded. It's about $30/month and just a few dollars a month (most people put in just $5) should keep it running. All donations welcome, link is below. Make sure to add your steam name in the 'Notes'.

group.headline: An international group that denounces the behaviour of Team Fortress 2 developers towards Idlers!
group.summary:
The purpose of that group is not to form an anti-Halo community, but to denounce the behaviour of Team Fortress 2 developers towards Idlers.

Indeed, the implementation of an unfair drop system in order to obtain hats and weapons is ruining the game. Most of the players do not play more than for this one.

But the worst is to treat the players of cheaters, while they had never been warned that what they made was not authorized.

Then, if as me you idled or that you continue to idle, join this group to express your anger towards Team Fortress 2 developers.

Everybody can join the group: Idlers, non-Idlers, Halo-wearers and more!

To contact us : data@proud-to-idle.com

/!\ Trolls, spam and insults will be deleted without notice! /!\

[Proud To Idle] Servers :
-----------------------------

No servers at the moment. :(

Many thanks to Â«tCoÂºÂ» miKe |mtcf, Kallard, [LNS] Yachi and y_3 for their old servers!

- DaTa -

Finally we won! Cheater's Lament for everybody!

group.headline: Full of Awesome since '09!
group.summary:
We want you!

MCA is a new group and website/forum/TF2 server ready to explode with awesomeness. This group is a meeting point for everyone awesome on Steam who has found the group. If you know someone awesome, please invite them too! We are always looking for new awesomesauce to add to our pie.

If you want to spread the word even more than by just being awesome, add [MCA] to your steam name. When people inevitably bask in the glow of the tag and your awesomeness, kindly direct them to this page.

Join this group and the forum to stay up to the minute with the latest announcements and discussions revolving around MCA.

Sadly, until we build the community to a sufficient level, the TF2 server is temporarily deativated. Post on the forum and invite your friends, and hopefully we will be able to start it up again, better than ever!

group.headline: Worms Reloaded
group.summary: The title is an extended edition of the digital-download console Worms games we've done in the last few years and we hope it will appeal to new and old players alike.

group.headline: Welcome to TheLiveGames! Streaming your favorite games all day, every day.
group.summary:
Hello, one and all!

Welcome to TheLiveGames.
First of all, the URL is
www.TLGHQ.com

About the site:
There are two sections to the site as of right now: Our Vidya (Video Games) channel, and our TV channel (TLG TV). You can switch between them on the stream/chat page with the buttons on the top left of the page. There are other nifty tools up there too, but you can figure those out.

Our site is outfitted with a stream hosted by Livestream.com, as well as a custom chat. Our friendly members will gladly welcome newcomers!

group.headline: Bowel Movements on Demand!
group.summary:
Are you having trouble clearing your rectum? Shitclogs got you down?


Prune Brothers.

group.headline: We paid for the hat - Not the game!
group.summary:
This group is dedicated to all us, who bought the new Sam & Max-game, 'Sam and Max: The Devils Playhouse' before April 24th, and recieved three Items, including Max's Severed Head!

If you are one of us, go ahead and join this group!
- And invite your friends, who got Max's Severed Head as well!

group.headline: Sam & Max Devil's Playhouse
group.summary:
This is the non-official Sam and Max The Devil's Playhouse. We will keep all the information you want to know in this group!
This season is composed by 5 games:
* Episode 1: The Penal Zone - Now Available!
* Episode 2: The Tomb of Sammun-Mak - Now Available!
* Episode 3: They Stole Max's Brain! - Now Available!
* Episode 4: Beyond the Alley of the Dolls - Now Avaiable!
* Episode 5: The City That Dares Not Sleep - Now Available!

group.headline: Land of Fruition since 09.08.2009!
group.summary:
Calone is a constitutional, liberal, and a non-partisan democratic society, which aims
to provide a non-violent and a joyful environment in which people can freely express their desires and goals.

The name, Calone, not only stands for the types of government aforementioned, but it also stands for
central node. The predecessors of the Steam Community have faced a great deal of instability in both internal and
external affairs of the respective societies over which they have reigned. The word, "central", refers to the idea of
stability, where the society will not be in a vulnerable state due to rebellion and dissatisfaction
with our government. On the other hand, the word, "node", refers to a point where no fluctuations (waves) occur.
Waves represent instability in a society, and a node is the only point in a wave of one wavelength where change
does not occur.

However, Calone's ability to ensure peace and happiness does not necessariy mean it will try accommodate
all groups and people. It is by common sense which a society must defend for itself from other raiding groups.
The raiding groups, apparently, can be considered those who oppose peace and happiness. The precedessors of Steam
Community have faced members spreading false rumours, calling people over here and there hackers and spammers.
Although members may have partaken in those acts, we should all learn to forgive and understand one another.
Over time, as our sincere desire to provide peace and happiness becomes evident for the citizens of Calone, people
will understand how maintaining such a peaceful state is much needed.

False rumours are nowhere to be true. One instance, which shrouds the actual truth of the matter, is
Michael Jackson's child abuse incident in 1992. People think that the King of Pop actually molested a child
that time, but evidence and eventual testimony claims that the child abuse is a lie. If you do not believe me,
contact me, and we will debate. I advise you not to heed to thoe liars who think they know a great deal about
the King of Pop.

Calone, as it develops, will promise to become more helpful towards achieving the ultimate goal in
Steam Community, peace and happiness. May peaceful freedom, peaceful coexistence, and peaceful Calone come to
fruition.

IN ORDER TO PROMOTE A NON-VIOLENT AND A NON-TENSE GROUP, IF ANYONE SIGHTS A DIRECT INSULT, TROLLING, OR SPAMMING
IN CALONE, PLEASE FEEL FREE TO REPORT ON THE INDIVIDUAL WHO POSTS THOSE SLANDERS. AS MORE PEOPLE REPORT, THE MORE
EFFECTIVE THE REPORTS WILL BE.

group.headline: Bringing Mac & Windows Steam Gamers Together Since May 2010
group.summary:
Nothing like a little competiton to bring two platforms together :)

Anyone who games on Steam, whether it's on a Macintosh or a Windows based PC is always welcome to join!

Valve is also working on a native build of Source and Steam for Linux, regardless Linux users are welcome to join too!
